title: Herbert Hoover National Historic Site: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        Volunteers scatter seeds as part of a prairie restoration project. NPS Photo       Get involved and support Herbert Hoover National Historic Site by donating, by shopping at our bookstore, by joining our friends, or by volunteering. Donate Your donation to Herbert Hoover National Historic Site helps preserve and interpret the legacy of Herbert Hoover, 31st President of the United States. Learn more » Volunteer Volunteering gives you hands-on experience working with the public, park staff, and park resources. Find volunteer opportunities »  Join Our Friends The Hoover Presidential Foundation supports both Herbert Hoover National Historic Site and the Herbert Hoover Presidential Library and Museum. The Foundation helps preserve historical resources and promotes appreciation for Herbert Hoover. Learn more and join » Shop in Our Bookstore All purchases benefit Herbert Hoover National Historic Site. The park bookstore at the visitor center is operated by Eastern National, a not-for-profit cooperating organization that provides quality educational products and services to park visitors.
